listeningQuestion.question: Why did the man climb up the ladder?
listeningQuestion.translation: 这个人为什么要爬梯子？

editorNotes: 这篇文章讲述了一个幽默的误会事件。主人公深夜回家时发现妻子睡得太熟，无法叫醒，于是试图通过梯子爬进卧室，却被警察误认为是小偷。文章通过对话展现了主人公的机智应对和警察的幽默回应。语法重点包括情态动词、动名词和并列句的使用。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: It must have been about two in the morning when I returned home.
I tried to wake up my wife by ringing the doorbell, but she was fast asleep, so I got a ladder from the shed in the garden, put it against the wall, and began climbing towards the bedroom window.
I was almost there when a sarcastic voice below said, 'I don't think the windows need cleaning at this time of the night.'
I looked down and nearly fell off the ladder when I saw a policeman.
I immediately regretted answering in the way I did, but I said, 'I enjoy cleaning windows at night.'
'So do I,' answered the policeman in the same tone.
'Excuse my interrupting you. I hate to interrupt a man when he's busy working, but would you mind coming with me to the station?'
'Well, I'd prefer to stay here,' I said. 'You see. I've forgotten my key.'
Fortunately, the shouting woke up my wife who opened the window just as the policeman had started to climb towards me.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我回到家时，肯定已是凌晨两点左右了。
我按响了门铃，试图唤醒我的妻子，但她睡得很熟。于是，我从花园的小棚里搬来了一个梯子，把它靠在墙边，开始向卧室的窗口爬去。
快要爬到窗口时，下面一个人用讽刺的口吻说："我看不必在夜里这个时候擦窗子吧。"
我向下面看去。当我看清是一个警察时，差一点儿从梯子上掉下去。
我回答了他的话，但马上又后悔不该那样说，我是这样说的："我喜欢在夜里擦窗子。"
"我也是的，"警察用同样的声调回答，
"请原谅我打断了您。当一个人在忙着干活时，我是不愿意去打断他的，但请您跟我到警察局去一趟好吗？"
"可我更愿意呆在这儿，"我说，"您瞧，我忘带钥匙了。"
幸运得很，这喊声惊醒了我的妻子。就在警察开始向我爬上来时，她打开了窗子。

notes.title: 情态动词用法
content: must have been (表示对过去事情的推测)

notes.title: 并列句结构
content: neither/nor + 助动词 + 主语 (表示否定附和)

notes.example: To talk to him now is to ask for trouble

notes.context: 表示用相同的说话方式
notes.example: answered the policeman in the same tone

multipleChoice.question: Why did the man try to climb into his house?
options: Because his wife was fast asleep
Because he wanted to clean the windows
Because he was trying to escape
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到他试图通过门铃叫醒妻子，但她睡得太熟，所以他才选择爬梯子。

fillInBlanks.sentence: I ___ to wake up my wife by ringing the doorbell, but she was ___ asleep.
fillInBlanks.hint: 使用表示尝试的动词和表示熟睡的形容词

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 这篇文章反映了英国警察的幽默感和处理方式。即使在看似可疑的情况下，警察也能保持礼貌和专业，通过幽默的方式化解尴尬。这也展示了英国人的幽默感和处事方式。
